price: (Firauni) akawaambia waheshimiwa walio mzunguka: Hakika huyu ni mchawi mtaalamu.
arabic: قَالَ لِلۡمَلَإِ حَوۡلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٞ
footnotes: Firauni akawaambia watu wake: Hakika Musa ni mchawi bingwa katika uchawi wake. Kasema hayo kwa kuchelea watu wake wasiifuate Haki waliyo iona kwa Musa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla lil'mala-i ḥawlahu inna hādhā lasāḥirun ʿalīmun
